original_text: And when he had gone a little farther thence, he saw James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother, who also were in the ship mending their nets.
korean_text: 조금 더 가시다가 세베대의 아들 야고보와 그 형제 요한을 보시니 그들도 배에 있어 그물을 깁는데

sentences.original_text: And when he had gone a little farther thence
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그곳에서 조금 더 나아갔을 때

sentences.original_text: he saw James the son of Zebedee
who also were in the ship
